1.title: Meet Man and Wife
1.plot: Fatman Scoop and his wife Shanda bring their web podcast to your TV. Tune in and learn the difference between ho's and housewives, whether or not you should talk your partner into a threesome, and who you should really be getting advice from. Remember love is beautiful.

2.title: What We Do
2.plot: Scoop and Shanda work out and lay down the rules of dating-watch and see what they do and how they do it. Happily married Man and Wife answers the hard questions-Am I just a booty call? Why do men cheat? Watch. Learn. Relate. And debate.

3.title: The No-No's of Love
3.plot: Scoop refuses to bring dildo's across the state line and Shanda makes him pay for it as Man and Wife take on No-No's: Don't abstain from the vibrator. Don't get naked on your web cam. Watch, learn, and keep your partner saying: "Yes! Yes!"

6.title: What I Like and Don't Like About You
6.plot: Scoop and Shanda always let each other know what they do and don't like. Do they have more in common than sex? How does Shanda cope with Scoop's ADD? How are you going to deal with your cheap ass boyfriend? And what does all of this have to do with communication?

8.title: Sex Ed 101
8.plot: Bet you never had a sex education class like you'll have on tonight's special episode of Man and Wife! Find out everything you never thought you knew about intercourse, masturbation, and, well, just about anything else sex related!

9.title: Getting Advice from Others
9.plot: Even Scoop and Shanda need to go to other people for help. For an entire episode, others will help them help you! Do women prefer circumcised or uncircumcised wee-wees? What does it mean to blow a back out? And what did the man say when he passed by the fish market? Tune in tonight and find out on Man and Wife!

10.title: The Internet
10.plot: It's a new day in age and people do things like break up over facebook and myspace. Scoop and Shanda are here to help you know what you should and shouldn't do on the internet and how the simple mechanics of typing can sometimes lead to cheating.

13.title: Tell the Truth
13.plot: Sometimes you just need to face the facts: women sometimes need to wear condoms, your boyfriend may not want to marry you, and you're dating someone who has a STD. Scoop and Shanda break down the truth for you, while still keeping up their sense of humor.

15.title: Scoop Care
15.plot: Shanda insists that Scoop gets to the doctor which he avoids like the plague, as he is terrified of needles. But he must go because he has diabetes and his blood sugar level is through the roof.

imdb.title: Man and Wife
plot: A married couple discuss their views on topics and issues relating to money, relationships, jobs, politics, intimacy, and marriage.
